question_text: Which two actions are recommended before working inside a powered-down desktop computer? (Select two)
answer_options: Connect an antistatic strap to an outlet ground
Ensure the power supply is unplugged
Discharge the capacitors manually if possible
Flip the PSU switch to the ON position
correct_answer: Ensure the power supply is unplugged
Discharge the capacitors manually if possible
explanation: Unplugging is essential, and discharging residual voltage increases technician safety.
